column5: Stay aboard on your own private yacht. Our 42 foot Carver has 2 very comfortable bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with showers, a rare find on boats. Full size kitchen and living room as well and 3 tvs! Docked at South Shore Harbor Resort which is close to the Kemah Boardwalk, NASA Space Center, Moody Gardens and Galveston beach. The resort has an awesome pool with swim up bar, restaurant and laundry center.
